founder.name: Ayaz
founder.bio: With over 8 years of experience in software development, Ayaz founded DigiCraft to bridge the gap between great ideas and great software. He's passionate about building products that solve real problems and scale with growing businesses.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: Clear communication, honest timelines, and upfront pricing. No surprises, ever.

values.title: Quality
values.description: We write code like our reputation depends on it—because it does.

values.title: Speed
values.description: Fast iterations, quick feedback, and rapid deployment without cutting corners.

whyChooseUs.title: Product-Minded Engineers
whyChooseUs.description: We don't just write code—we think about user experience, business goals, and long-term scalability.

whyChooseUs.title: Fast Time to Market
whyChooseUs.description: Our streamlined process gets your MVP to market in 6-12 weeks, not months.

whyChooseUs.title: Transparent Pricing
whyChooseUs.description: No hidden fees or surprise costs. Clear packages with upfront pricing.

whyChooseUs.title: Ongoing Support
whyChooseUs.description: We're here for the long haul with maintenance, updates, and scaling support.

whyChooseUs.title: Modern Technology
whyChooseUs.description: We use cutting-edge tools and frameworks to build fast, secure, and maintainable software.

whyChooseUs.title: Dedicated Team
whyChooseUs.description: Work directly with experienced developers who understand your business goals.

companyInfo.title: About DigiCraft.space
companyInfo.description: We're a team of product-minded engineers who believe great software starts with understanding the problem. Founded in 2023, we've helped dozens of startups and growing businesses turn their ideas into successful digital products.
